altTitles.en: Everything for the Sake of Love
If Someone Like Me Could Do That
If Someone Like Me Will Do

description.en:
Everything For the Sake of Love  
Akira is a kind girl who loves to be with her friends. Because of her high success rate in matchmaking, her friends have given her the title of "Queen of Introductions" (Matchmaking Queen)! But for some reason, Aki-chan can't seem to get a boyfriend for herself…  
  
Also includes the one-shots:  
If Someone Like Me Would Do  
Chocolate Contest  
  
[PL] Zbiór 3 oneshotów:  
  
1. W imię miłości – Co się stanie, kiedy sama bogini swatek poczuje motylki w brzuchu, a jedna z jej znajomych będzie chciała numer telefonu ukochanego boginki?  
  
2. Gdyby ktoś mnie lubił – „Jeśli Hashimoto pocałuje laskę, którą wybierze w trakcie jednego miesiąca, damy mu tysiąc yenów.”, czy Hashimoto znajdzie dziewczynę i uda mu się zdobyć pieniądze?  
  
3. Czekoladowa rywalizacja – Co czuje chłopak w trakcie Walentynek?

biography.en:
Associated Names:
Kazune Kawahara
Кавахара Кадзунэ
河源和音

Name (in native language):
河原和音

Birth Place:
Hokkaido, Japan

Birth Date:
March 11, 1972

Zodiac:
Pisces

Blood Type:
A

Gender:
Female

Other:
At 18, debuted with "Kare no Ichiban Sukina Hito".

She likes gaming, reading manga, and eating. Her hobby is interior redecorating. Also, while thinking of her manga, she often spaces out and brings grocery baskets home. Adores her nieces.
